titleInfo.title: R U N A W A Y.

mods.abstract: R U N A W A Y . A NEGRO GIRL, named Francoise, about 33 years old, slim built, has a very small nose. The said girl was purchased from Preval Allen, about five months ago. $10 REWARD! Will be given for her delivery to me at Waterloo. MEYER MICHEL. Waterloo. je16

detail.title: Pointe Coupee Democrat. : (False River [i.e. New Roads], Parish of Pointe Coupee [La.]) 1858-1896
